name: Rabby Wallet
highlight: The game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains
summary: Rabby Wallet is an open-sourced browser extension wallet for all EVM chains. Rabby offers a smooth multi-chain experience, allowing users to switch chains within a second while exploring Dapps. Rabby also protects users from security vulnerabilities by scanning every transaction to identify the potential risks. Rabby is designed and developed with a higher standard to guard users' asset security.
